core.testnet¶

eosfactory.core.testnet.JUNGLE = <eosfactory.core.testnet.Testnet object>¶

Testnet http;//145.239.133.201;8888

eosfactory.core.testnet.KYLIN = <eosfactory.core.testnet.Testnet object>¶

Testnet http;//145.239.133.201;9999

class eosfactory.core.testnet.Testnet(url=None, account_name=None, owner_key=None, active_key=None, reset=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Testing nodeos node.

Parameters:
  • url (str) – If set, the URL of a remote nodeos, otherwise a localhost URL.
  • account_name (str) – If set, the account name, otherwise the node is considered local and the name is eosio.
  • owner_key (str) – If set, the public owner key of the account.
  • active_key (str) – If set, the public active key of the account.
  • reset (bool) – If set and if local node, reset the node.
Variables:
  • url (str) – The URL of the nodeos.
  • account_name (str) – The name of the account.
  • owner_key (str) – The public owner key of the account.
  • active_key (str) – The public active key of the account.
clear_cache()[source]¶

Remove all the saved interaction with the testnet.

Remove wallets ascribed to the testnet, as wall as its account map and its password map.

configure(prefix=None)[source]¶

Set the testnet to be the listener to EOSFactory.

is_local()[source]¶

Check whether EOSFactory is connected to the local testnet.

Returns:bool – Whether EOSFactory is connected to the local testnet.
verify_production()[source]¶

Check whether the node is active.

Returns:bool – Whether the node is active.
eosfactory.core.testnet.add_testnet_to_mapping(testnet)[source]¶

Save the given Testnet object.

Parameters:testnet (Testnet) – The object to be saved.
eosfactory.core.testnet.add_to_mapping(url, account_name, owner_key, active_key, alias=None)[source]¶

Save a Testnet object.

Parameters:
  • url (str) – If set, the URL of a remote nodeos, otherwise a localhost URL.
  • account_name (str) – If set, the account name, otherwise the node is considered local and the name is eosio.
  • owner_key (str) – If set, the public owner key of the account.
  • active_key (str) – If set, the public active key of the account.
  • alias (str) – If set, the name of the testnet.
eosfactory.core.testnet.get_testnet(alias=None, testnet=None, reset=False)[source]¶

Return a testnet.

Parameters:
  • alias (str) – If set, the testnet alias, otherwise the local testnet is returned.
  • testnet (tuple) – The tuple (<url> <name> <owner key> <active key>) representing a Testnet object, returned if the alias argument is not set.
  • reset (bool) – If both the alias and testnet arguments are not set, determine whether the local node is to be reset.
Returns:

Testnet – a testnet
eosfactory.core.testnet.remove_from_mapping(testnet)[source]¶

Remove the given Testnet object from the record.

Parameters:testnet (Testnet) – The object to be saved.
eosfactory.core.testnet.testnets()[source]¶

Print recorded Testnet objects.
